actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend section 3012 of title 38, United States Code, to extend to one hundred and twenty days the period between notice of, and the effective date for, the reduction or discontinuance of compensation, dependency and indemnity compensation, or pension.

summary.text: Extends from 60 to 120 days the period between notice of, and the effective date for, the reduction or discontinuance of compensation, dependency and indemnity compensation, or pension paid by the Veterans Administration.

titles.title: A bill to extend section 3012 of title 38, United States Code, to extend to one hundred and twenty days the period between notice of, and the effective date for, the reduction or discontinuance of compensation, dependency and indemnity compensation, or pension.
